countryFacts.interestingFacts: Has the world’s largest democracy. Home to the Kumbh Mela, visible from space during peak gatherings.
Has the world’s largest economy by nominal GDP. Alaska has more coastline than the rest of the U.S. combined.
The Great Wall is over 21,000 km long. Invented paper, gunpowder, compass, and printing.
Home to ~60% of the Amazon rainforest. Has the world’s largest carnival in Rio de Janeiro.
Africa’s most populous country. Nollywood is one of the world’s largest film industries.
The Great Wall of China is visible from space on rare occasions.
The Eiffel Tower in Paris was once the tallest man-made structure in the world.
Russia is the largest country in the world, more than 17 million square kilometers.
The Pyramids of Giza are one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World.
